Class JTrayIcon

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.TrayIcon
      • org.gjt.sp.jedit.gui.tray.JTrayIcon
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JEditTrayIcon

    public class JTrayIcon
extends java.awt.TrayIcon
    A TrayIcon that accepts Swing JPopupMenu.

    jEdit 4.5pre1
